mods.abstract: A black and white head-and-shoulders portrait of Afrikan Dreamland possibly promoting a live album called Nineteen Eighty Oneness: The Double Dreamland Album. Afrikan Dreamland members are Aashid Himons (center), Darrell Rose, and Mustafa Abdul-Aleem. The print features images of palm trees, similar in style to the ones used in the Ayo record label logo, along the border of the band's photo.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
